import { Map } from 'lucide-react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSearchParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { CheckFetch } from '../components/BadFatchDisclaimer' import { UkrainianWar } from '../components/BlockSaveUkraine' import { BurgerMenu } from '../components/BurgerMenu' import { Footer } from '../components/Footer' import MyLoader from '../components/Loader' import { NavBar } from '../components/NavBar' import useFetchGet from '../hooks/fetch/useFetchGet' import { extractHoursAndMinutes, formatDate } from '../js/TimeValidation' export function Match() { const [searchParams] = useSearchParams() const idMatch = searchParams.get('idMatch') const [matches, setData] = useState([]) const { Data, isLoading, failedToFetch } = useFetchGet({ url: 'http://localhost:4000/api/games/match/Match', id: idMatch, }) useEffect(() => { if (Data) { setData(Data) } }, [Data]) if (isLoading) { return } return (
{matches.map((match, index) => (
{/* Команда 1 */}

{match.Team1Name}

{match.Team1Score}

{match.Team1Coef}

{/* Результат */}

{formatDate(match.VsDate)}

Vs

{extractHoursAndMinutes(match.time)}

{/* Команда 2 */}

{match.Team2Name}

{match.Team2Score}

{match.Team2Coef}

))} {/* Повідомлення про помилку */} {failedToFetch && } {/* Ставка */}

Зробити ставку із коефіцієнтом

{/* Карти */}

Карти

{[1, 2, 3].map(mapIndex => (
Map {mapIndex}:
Bruv123 Kukuys
3.2K Gold 6.7K
41.1K Net 50.4K
7 Score 19
))}
{/* Статистика гравців */}

Статистика Гравців

{[1, 2].map(playerIndex => (
Player {playerIndex}:
Name Score Kill Death Assists
{playerIndex === 1 ? 'Bruv123' : 'Kukuys'} 3 10 4 5
))}
) }
